name: The Day of Delila Fahy...
description:
Story

 A young lady sets off on a dangerous mission, with the help of her three friends, to rejuvenate the health of a strange tree that is clearly being infected by some sort of dark Lichen parasite. The secret to its rejuvenation lay in crafting a potent anti-parasite concoction, that she can't hope to complete without help.

 The events that unfold, are a lesson in humility, and unintended consequences.

  

Controls

 (Standard RPGMaker fare)

Moving - W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys

Interaction - SPACE or Enter

Cancel/Exit - X

Open Menu - X

Scroll - PAGE-UP / DOWN or Q / E

 Also allows mouse use.

 

What To Expect

 Unfortunately, I am no digital artist, and trying to piece together tile sets from available community assets would have seriously restricted the time I had available to make this, so it relies exclusively on RTP, and a few extra tiles that were necessary (though perhaps a bit odd) to make things work in a pinch.

Also, I wasn't sure how to officially end the game... So, you're left at the Main Menu in game until you choose to save/return to title, etc...

 I really hope you enjoy this as much or more than I did making it!

  

Important Note!

 I implore you, that if you have anything to say about this project, please do!

 No amount of feedback is too little, nor too much. Good, or bad, I would love it all.

 I can’t hope to improve what I'm unaware of.

 So please, even if you think it's obvious, or someone else already mentioned it, please tell me anyway!

 Repeating an issue, reinforces it's importance, and even the most unusual feedback can have real value! So believe me, I want you to BE CRITICAL!

  

Known Issues

There appears to be a totally intermittent issue (only happened once) with the crafting plugin causing status violations, on exiting it. I am unsure if it only happened because it was in test mode. If it happens, a recent Auto Save, should be enough to get past.
